# The Linear Ballistic Aclimatiser 


```{r LBA Picture, echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("_images/LBA.jpg")
```
The LBA model of decision-making which explains the trade off between speed and caution. A basic framework for a simple two choice paradigm is shown. The two accumulators ``race'' by accumulating evidence for either decision before reaching the response threshold. The first accumulator to reach the threshold triggers the associated decision.
